keyMoments.title: Madam Shyarly's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: Shyarly is introduced as the proprietor of the Mermaid Cafe and a renowned fortune teller who has retired from her profession.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a character whose prophecy will be central to the Fish-Man Island Arc's tension and mystery.
keyMoments.quote: I don't do fortune telling anymore. The future is better left unknown.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Arlong's Sister
keyMoments.description: It is revealed that Shyarly is the half-sister of Arlong, the fish-man who terrorized Nami's village, though she does not share his prejudices.
keyMoments.significance: Creates a connection to the Straw Hats' past while demonstrating that family ties don't determine one's values.

keyMoments.title: Prophecy of Fish-Man Island's Destruction
keyMoments.description: Shyarly has a vision that Luffy will destroy Fish-Man Island and runs into the streets to warn everyone, declaring he must be banished from the island.
keyMoments.significance: Delivers one of the most important prophecies in One Piece, creating tension that spans the arc and potentially connects to endgame events.
keyMoments.quote: The future has shown me... Fish-Man Island will be destroyed by the man in the straw hat!

abilities.description: Shyarly can see the future using her crystal ball. Her predictions are highly accurate and include foreseeing the Great Pirate Era, Whitebeard's death, and the Mermaid Princess's birth.
As a mermaid, Shyarly can swim at high speeds underwater and breathe underwater indefinitely.

relationships.description: Shyarly is Arlong's half-sister, though unlike him, she harbors no hatred toward humans and encourages independent thinking.

evolutionMoments.description: Revealed to be Arlong's half-sister, creating a connection to the Arlong Park arc.

reveals.information: Possesses the ability to accurately predict the future through scrying
Foresees that Luffy will destroy Fish-Man Island

keyMoments.title: Blood Donor for Sanji
keyMoments.description: Splash is revealed as one of the twin newkama pirates who donated blood to save Sanji's life, along with his brother Splatter.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the rare S RH- blood type needed to save Sanji from death.
keyMoments.quote: We were happy to help! If you need more blood, we can give you more!

relationships.description: Splash and Splatter are twin brothers.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as twin brothers who both donated blood to Sanji.

relationships.description: Saved Sanji's life by donating blood when he was dying from blood loss.

evolutionMoments.description: Donated blood to save Sanji's life.

reveals.information: One of the newkama pirates with rare S RH- blood type
